task_text: What is the primary contact email on proj_freshfoods_hygienic_flooring

text_blocks:
I see I'm an external user. Let me check the rulebook to understand my access rights before proceeding.

According to the rules, External users CANNOT access: employees, projects, customers, salaries, time entries, customer contact emails/phones. Even if a project exists and has a customer, External users asking for 'customer contact email' should receive a denied_security response.

input.message: I'm unable to provide customer contact information for this project. As an external user, you don't have access to project details or customer contact information in our system. Please reach out to your Bellini contact person directly for this information.
